website_summaries.verdict: Easy to move throughout homes and classrooms while providing multiple functions.
pros: Seamless design blends look and function
Wheels feature casters with locking brakes for safety
Provides flexible learning opportunities along with efficient design features
Easy to clean and does not stain
cons: Can only be used with neodymium magnets

customer_reviews.title: Screws are NOT missing! Some are pre-installed in the bars!!
customer_reviews.text: Hi! I’m super happy! This thing is a tank and built well! Not flimsy at all. Comes with protective clear tape for the surfaces. The box it comes in is super protective. I was sad when I got it that it was missing screws but then I emailed support and they replied within an hour. Probably within 30 min and told me that 8 of the heavy duty screws were already in the bars. I thought it was missing because it also came with screws in a small plastic bag. I’m very happy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kendangerous

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly, high quality materials
customer_reviews.text: This double sided vertical portable white board was super easy to assemble. No tools needed; everything was provided right in the box! The frame is powder-coated steel, the fasteners are strong and simple. I assembled this myself in under 30 minutes. Great price for a great product!
customer_reviews.author: MICHELLE T KELLY

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I just got this dry erase board and it looks great! It was easy to put together and I think it looks really good. It comes with markers and magnets and an eraser. My only two concerns are... ... the wheels. I don't really have a concern about these wheels, but I have had products with similar wheels and the wheels have broken off. So far, not an issue, but I will update if they do break. ... the board is permanently tilted. I wish I could adjust the tilt, but it is what it is. Overall, I am pleased and look forward to using it regularly!
customer_reviews.author: Matt Acton

customer_reviews.title: Delivered Intact, ontime and great product
customer_reviews.text: This arrived quickly with no breakage. It was easy to assemble and works great in my home office. The wheels make it easy to move around and the height adjustment allows me change the position of the board. Great item.
customer_reviews.author: Beav

customer_reviews.title: The whiteboard itself is great quality, and in general
customer_reviews.text: It came exactly as described, with the set of markers, the eraser, the magnets, and the clips to hold the marker holder. The whiteboard itself is great quality, and in general, looks very sleek. The markers erase completely with no ghosting visible at all, looks good as new. If you plan on writing a lot on the board though, I do recommend getting dry erase marker pens, as regular markers make it near impossible to write small and ledgible. Very satisfied with this product in general, and I would definitely buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: Edgar

customer_reviews.title: GREAT value for the low price!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased several of these mobile white boards over the years and it seems like all the ones that are priced at what I consider to be reasonable are also flimsy, unbalanced and difficult to move around. This one is excellent. It is sturdy and solid, I assembled it in less than 30 minutes. It moves around so easily and it's a very high quality product. I am super impressed. It also arrived very quickly and was impeccably packaged. I got more than I expected. I'm now planning on buying more to replace my other old flimsy ones. This is a great whiteboard.
customer_reviews.author: Cory P.

customer_reviews.title: Piece of innovation
customer_reviews.text: Really easy to assemble, looks beautiful in my home office. Packing was really superb.
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING PRODUCT!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is AMAZING!! Shipped beautifully and packaged very well! No damage, and everything sealed nicely! It’s very easy to assemble and I now really enjoy spending time supplementing my son’s curriculum at home! If you dread traditional whiteboards, GET ONE OF THESE!! You won’t be disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: The product seems like solid construction and it was very easy to piece ...
customer_reviews.text: Despite being glass, it arrived without any scratches or cracks! The product seems like solid construction and it was very easy to piece together. My only wish is that the board tilted down and up as it is locked into a ~5-7 degree slant (facing upwards a bit).
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Everything I Wanted
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect. It's exactly what I wanted. I didn't assemble it myself because I hate assembling things so I can't speak to how easy that is. But it's very sturdy, has just enough space for the markers, eraser, etc... and is just the right size. It is easy to flip/stay in place when you lock it in place and while it has wheels, it doesn't slide across the floor or anything like that so you're good. If you're thinking about getting this, get it.
customer_reviews.author: Melody Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Great Product / Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for writing specific goals and objectives so that I can see them on a regular basis. It is heavy and stable and easy to put together and move around. It wipes super clean and can be used as a magnetic board too. It also have loops to hang an easel pad. I would definitely purchase this product again and recommend to others!
customer_reviews.author: HIRTA Public Transit

customer_reviews.title: Everything was great a little heavier than I thought but not too ...
customer_reviews.text: Everything was great a little heavier than I thought but not too bad. I took a star off due to not coming with markers. It’s picky but it states it comes with them. It’s very easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: michael

customer_reviews.title: Ok white board
customer_reviews.text: White board arrived in good condition. I realized that I ordered the wrong size white board When it arrived. The white board cannot be returned because it is considered flammable and too dangerous to mail. Amazon corrected the order anyways. When I opened the white board o found the one wheel assembly is incorrect and will not fit the board. I have contacted customer service, which appears to be in China.
customer_reviews.author: XV123

customer_reviews.title: Not bad but not great......
customer_reviews.text: The board is not bad but is not great. The box was VERY securely packed by the manufacturer. However mine arrived with a hole on the front. Luckily the glass was not broken or scratched. I did not receive any of the accessories promised with the item. After unpacking and assembling I realized I had no markers to test it out. Went to office depot and picked up some glass markers but they do not work very well on this board. Will have to return it. Size of the board is good but it would be more useful horizontally.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Better frame than expected
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well constructed whiteboard. The framing is much stronger than expected and gives a nice solid surface to write against. The whiteboard is smooth and wipes clean easily with the dry erase markers. It does not leave marks behind which are difficult to remove like some whiteboards. It does have a bit of reflection and glare when using with nearby lighting. This is common with whiteboards, but since I am using for filming training videos thought it was worth mentioning.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Bruner

customer_reviews.title: Great whiteboard
customer_reviews.text: I really like the white board size but the base of the white board is so much bigger and bulkier than I expected. It makes it hard to pt in smaller places.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Only got 3 markers, but happy overall
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for daily use in my office to replace my current whiteboard which is falling apart. I only received 3 markers, but other than that all of the parts were there, even had a few screws leftover (I'm sure I'll figure out what that means eventually). I docked one star for the missing markers and another because getting ahold of the seller to correct the issue is more challenging than I think it should be. Still a decent board at the end of the day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 8 of the screws are already screwed into two of the post
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Market quality and board quality itself is really good. The size is just perfect. Bad is one side of the board came damaged...but they sent out a replacement while I was able to hold on the the board originally sent. The replacement solved the problem and this board is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Galileo

customer_reviews.title: 👍👍
customer_reviews.text: My girls really enjoy the mobile dry erase board. They draws on it every day when they come home from school. The double sided board is sturdy and big enough for my family. Glad that I bought it. I've recommended to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: benny

customer_reviews.title: great for kids
customer_reviews.text: Seems great This white board is easy to maneuver around a room and does so without feeling like it's going to fall over. The flipping function of the board is very easy and convenient as well. The assembly was easy but Need 2 people to do it. It is perfect for big families like me. We use the board to record and tells us where everyone needs to be.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Can’t beat the price!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome unit...I couldn't believe that I got this board for that price! Great packaging and came with markers, eraser, magnets. It’s mobile and double sided, you can move it wherever you want and use the both sides.
customer_reviews.author: Season

customer_reviews.title: Great board, very cool how it is glass and ...
customer_reviews.text: Great board, very cool how it is glass and can always wipe clean. If you use a poor quality marker it may appear very faint or have a weird reflection, but if you use a quality market you are good! The packaging was great and it was easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony S.

customer_reviews.title: Good, sturdy construction. Easy assembly.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for our youth ministry room as a movable board for teaching and games. I was pleasantly surprised by the hardware quality - good screws that don't crossthread and tightened well within metal fittings. Paint coating is solid. The welds look small but are good. The board itself was well protected in shipping by inside-the-box cardboard sheets plus plastic film. They included extra hardware in case a screw or two was missing. Just all around good product.
customer_reviews.author: Memorial UMC

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for the small group section of my classroom, since it is not near my main white-board. It was easy to assemble, although the pictures for some of the assembly were a bit confusing (step 5 in particular). The markers and erasers and magnets that were included were a nice addition. I am excited to use this with my students!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Overall, Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: This product was easy to assemble; the quality for the price is very good. The wheels work well, the board is a medium size, and the look of the board is modern and appealing. However, I have one concern, when I write on the board or erase the board slightly moves, which is annoying. However, its not that the wheels move (as you can lock them), just the board itself slightly moves. Yet, I still enjoy the board overall.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Good board, but wobbles way too much
customer_reviews.text: You have to hold the board with one hand while you write or erase, otherwise it wobbles enough that you can't use it. Board quality is nice, erases easily. Assembly was easy.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun

customer_reviews.title: 7 years old daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: My daughter started 1st grade this year and we had been looking for a good white board that fits our home office. This one is definitely the room, it’s high end and it’s easy to assemble. It’s easy to erase as well: daughter loves it
customer_reviews.author: MZ

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Rolling White Board
customer_reviews.text: Never had a white board this nice or sturdy --- It is extremely well made , you will be totally satisfied with your purchase. Buy with confidence.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney D Wood

customer_reviews.title: Not magnetic!
customer_reviews.text: This product says it is magnetic, that is why I purchased it. The magnetism is almost non exsistence. I wanted to use it in the classroom for my students to use magnetic letters and numbers. It works fine for a whiteboard and holds my chart papers, but it is not magnetic.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!! But to big for me lol
customer_reviews.text: I love my new white board! Don’t forget to removed the plastic! The only issue is that it is huge for me !! The board is bigger than me lol Iam 5ft 2” But it’s ok, I can handle it 🙂
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Tello

customer_reviews.title: Ideal to resovle an immediate unpredictable need
customer_reviews.text: I used this product during my remote teacher required now because of the virus. I liked how quickly iT came to my home including all the materials I needed like markers and magnets. This was during a time when I needed immediatl support & supplies to do my job. I did learn how to use the whiteboard on zoom and goole classroom but this allowed me to respond real time to questions and not have to share my screen. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Lip

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: The white board was easy to assemble, sturdy enough for a lightweight board, no problems of any kind. I wish it had the option to lock it in different positions/angles, but I guess I didn't pay enough attention to this when i made the purchase. The standard angle it locks into is good, slightly tilted to make it easier to write on.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic deal! The quality is great. I saw other people thought they didn’t get enough parts but they are in the rails screwed in. You need to unscrew them and then use them. Actually pretty smart so they aren’t lost or forgotten. Thanks for the great white board!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worst Board ever.
customer_reviews.text: This was THE WORST PRODUCT EVER. I love assembling items, but this was a nightmare. I was shorted 9 out of 12 bolts. I went to the store and purchased what I needed. Then the supporting cross poles didn't fit into the holes. I chucked the entire $150 board into the trash. Thankfully Amazon gave me a refund!!
customer_reviews.author: Diane Toohey

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful mobile whiteboard, worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect mobile whiteboard for our new office. It’s great quality and size, won’t take a lot of space but double-sided writing surface. Write and clean is smooth and easy. All in all just what we needed.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: Necessary for remote teaching at home
customer_reviews.text: It took a little longer assembling it then I thought it would take. However, it’s a great idea to have this at home while my kids are doing remote learning. Gives me enough space to do a whole lesson without having to worry about running out of space.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s so so
customer_reviews.text: Hard to get the dry erase marker off the board. Flips when you are trying to write on it.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Goodman

customer_reviews.title: Great white board purchased for homeschooling while daughter heals after accident
customer_reviews.text: PROS: Very sturdy construction, rotates smoothly, hardware was complete, free set of markers with this review! CONS: Included markers are not white board friendly, the supplied eraser couldn't erase them, had to use a magic eraser pad.
customer_reviews.author: 68AMC343

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought one over the summer for a classroom and the other teachers have started requesting them as well. This is the second one I ordered, I will likely order two more. Easy to move, double sided, tilts, large enough to be effective, small enough to take up little classroom space. Excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Adult Education

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Small Office Use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. LOVE the glass design AND the fact that you can hang easel paper pads from the hooks. Wish the wheels rolled more easily, but overall, a great product and certainly worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Katie D.

customer_reviews.title: nice board
customer_reviews.text: Bought for the new home office/classroom. Nice looking and good quality just as described. The white is an off white and not a bright white in case that matters to you. Packaging was great and arrived undamaged even if it had a few dents and marks on the outside of the packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle J.

customer_reviews.title: This works great in my retail store
customer_reviews.text: This works great in my retail store. The biggest issue I have is that the board does not stand level. It tilts down on the left side. I cannot see any way to adjust it. Otherwise it's been great.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: GREAT WHITEBOARD!
customer_reviews.text: This whiteboard is perfect for mobility! I am a school counselor, and I can wheel it around the school to teach lessons. Very easy to erase, and I love the eraser with the magnet! It was a great bargain and I have enjoyed using it.
customer_reviews.author: Chloe Cox

customer_reviews.title: Good whiteboard
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Comes with 3 markers, eraser and 6 magnets. Can flip to use both sides as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Reid

customer_reviews.title: I love the portability
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted for my home office! There isn't anything comparable on the market at this price or at a higher price. I love the portability, locking wheels, and substantial look/feel of this board. Thank you WEYOUNG!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy with Product
customer_reviews.text: The office that I work in wanted a dry erase board. I found this one and all approve. It arrived here a day early, was very well packaged, and looks very elegant. Not to mention, it rolls around with ease. Very happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: daveand kim p zimmerman

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: The product was delivered today but missing the part (6) the cap that holds the columns together. Looks like the packaging was very sturdy but the logistics of making sure all parts are included has failed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: While I was skeptical at first, it’s actually a pretty good whiteboard for the price, and very basic to assemble, which is a plus. The only thing that may be a downside is that I haven’t yet found a lock function on the rotating board. Definitely great for kids and adults!
customer_reviews.author: Dylon Lipscomb

customer_reviews.title: Excellent mobile Whiteboard for classroom
customer_reviews.text: I'm have been very pleased with whiteboard so far. Assembly was simple. The board is a nice size for the amount of instruction I do (youth pastor) in an approximately 20'x20' room. The mobility is great as well. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: MBP

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Just by handling the materials of this board you can tell right away that they have some weight to them and they are not cheap whatsoever. Absolutely worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Jason li

customer_reviews.title: Good to use
customer_reviews.text: We purchased the whiteboard in September and have used it for a while. It is very stable and easy to use. We are pretty satisfied with it.
customer_reviews.author: Yandy

customer_reviews.title: Works well!  Great buy!!
customer_reviews.text: Fits well in a classroom setting. It is great for differentiated instruction.
customer_reviews.author: OAPL

customer_reviews.title: This is a great piece of Office Furniture! Functional and Looks Great!!
customer_reviews.text: this is everything it is described to be! It is a beautiful addition to my office and incredibly functional. I'll be using it as a whiteboard and also for preparing the 2' x 3' sheets that can be adhered to the wall during brainstorming. super easy installation.
customer_reviews.author: NJonge01

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: This product is very good quality except one small part was missing - the cap that covers the spring in the tube. Otherwise very nice product
customer_reviews.author: Cecil Touchon

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: This board is beautiful, very sturdy and easy to clean. The base is pretty big, so if you're intending on sliding it into a space make sure you measure first, as it's wider than it looks in the picture. Comes with dry erase markers, magnets and an eraser.
customer_reviews.author: Bets

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic, great board for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This was a great deal especially considering it was on sale for Amazon Prime day. We are really pleased with the quality of this product and how easy it was to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Norman Ridgway

customer_reviews.title: Great price and great product
customer_reviews.text: Husband loves it for his engineering office. Cooworkers loved it also and they ordered several for the office.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Womack

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the money...would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.text: Would recommend better labeling/clarification in instructions as to where all fasteners (i.e.: screws, washers, etc.) are located. Some were difficult to locate.
customer_reviews.author: Eat Smart Idaho - University of Idaho

customer_reviews.title: Good product, poor assembly instructions
customer_reviews.text: Awesome board - sturdy! Assembling it was kind of frustrating and tricky, the instructions could be a lot better.
customer_reviews.author: cathho

customer_reviews.title: Best Dry Erase Board!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent dry erase board. Being that it is glass the markers are always able to be erased. Very easy to assemble and durable. I would highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy whiteboard
customer_reviews.text: You can't go wrong, especially as a student, with this whiteboard. Large whiteboard but doesn't take up too much space in a small apartment. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Meinecke

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for study rooms at a school. The students love them.
customer_reviews.author: K. Hofmeister

customer_reviews.title: Overall high quality
customer_reviews.text: Overall, it’s a high quality product. Easy to assemble. The reason I gave four star is with lock on, the screen is still a little moving when you write.
customer_reviews.author: young s jo

customer_reviews.title: Great Board
customer_reviews.text: It is a great product!!! Very easy to assemble. I wish it didn't have a slight tilt but other than that, I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothea Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Size!
customer_reviews.text: I really like the size of this whiteboard. Double sided with more than enough space to write on. Also easy to move and have in any size room.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome design. I use it in my classroom. Magnets work great on it and all colors erase easily
customer_reviews.author: Kackylou

customer_reviews.title: Good moveable board.
customer_reviews.text: Just the right size. Love the ability to move easily on roller wheels
customer_reviews.author: Brian Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Stand is great- board, not so much
customer_reviews.text: The white board itself is not very good quality. When you erase you can still see the content that was on there.
customer_reviews.author: natalie

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. Some mislabeling of parts in the instruction but it all worked out
customer_reviews.author: d2

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy whiteboard!
customer_reviews.text: Good board, easy instructions and quick setup. Seems very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Rosalva Maldonado

customer_reviews.title: All-around good product
customer_reviews.text: The assembly instructions could be a little more clear but not bad. Good product, not disappointed at all
customer_reviews.author: Kaylen C

customer_reviews.title: Great whiteboard
customer_reviews.text: This whiteboard is sturdy and was very easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: mlover

customer_reviews.title: It's great for office meeting use since it's mobile
customer_reviews.text: It's great for office meeting use since it's mobile. Only thing I wish it was capable of, was to rotate it from vertical to horizontal.
customer_reviews.author: Eva Kwong

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I would suggest this whiteboard to anyone. It was easy to put together, it rolls well, and it works great for what I need it for.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna

customer_reviews.title: Our family like this board very much
customer_reviews.text: Our family like this board very much: having enough space, being easy to write and clean and very much durable. We use it very day!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. F. Liu

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly designed white board.
customer_reviews.text: The product is perfect for all of my studying. I especially like the design, and size of the white board.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: Great Board
customer_reviews.text: Love this item, use it to teach my son about Jesus
customer_reviews.author: Eladio Espinosa

customer_reviews.title: awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Really sturdy and sleek looking! Wipes clean easily! The wheels it easy to move to different room for our homeschooling. It came well packed and in great condition.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT. EXCELLENT PACKAGING AND EASY TO ASSEMBLE
customer_reviews.text: GREAT PRODUCT. EXCELLENT PACKAGING AND EASY TO ASSEMBLE. EXACTLY AS PROMISED.
customer_reviews.author: richard f urisko

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, this is exactly what I was looking for and continues serve me well everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Ade A.

customer_reviews.title: Looks pretty decent in my office
customer_reviews.text: First personal draw board in my home office. Good decision so far!
customer_reviews.author: Phaneendar R. Baddam

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Sturdy, convenient, mobile, versatile and value-priced. Definitely keeping me organized.
customer_reviews.author: TampaBay

customer_reviews.title: Great product.....but where's the clamp?
customer_reviews.text: Pros: -Arrived with the glass NOT being damaged. This is a big feat! -Easy to Assemble (15 minutes) -Sturdy -Looks really nice (why I bought it) Cons: -The instructions state it includes a clamp which can clip paper but nowhere in the box did I see this? Maybe I'm missing something. Overall, I'd buy again, just need to figure out the clamp.
customer_reviews.author: Smart Shopper

product_meta.title: Magnetic Mobile White Board 71 x 35 inch Big Double Sided Dry Erase Board Rolling Wheels Standing Whiteboard Flip Display with Markers,Magnets,Eraser and Tray
feature_bullets: PREMIUM MATERIAL AND SOLID CONSTRUCTION: Metal frame construction, strong ABS corners and solid hardware work together to make the rolling whiteboard sturdy, safe to use and last long. The H structure and 4 lockable wheels castors keep the easel stands stable and no wobble

DOUBLE SIDED MAGNETIC SURFACE AND EFFORTLESS ROLLING: The 71 x 35 inches big easel whiteboard provides enough space to organize ideas, teach lessons, or manage your work presentations. It is not only double sided but also reversible. Compared with traditional boards with handle or knob to rotation, there is no need for two people or adjust both sides to flip the standing whiteboard

STAND AND WRITE EASILY: According to the height feature of US people, we have raised the total height of the easel dry erase board to 78.8 inch which is 3-5 inches higher than similar double sided white board to make user stand and write easily

COMPLETE ACCESSORIES: 1 magnetic dry eraser, 12 dry erase marker pen, 12 magnets have been added to the package, once installed the white board well, you can use it directly! The long pen tray can conveniently stores and holds these accessories

All double-sided whiteboards are shipped in multi-layer reinforced padded shipping boxes. We made sure to provide the ULTIMATE PADDING PROTECTION to our cushioned shipment boxes to assure our customers receive our whiteboards without damage! If you are not 100% satisfied, please contact us right away. Our hassle-free customer service team will work hard to solve any issue that you come across with dry erase board

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars161 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
